DOC.criteria: Significant coronary de novo lesion ( > 70 % quantitative angiographic analysis ) Patients stable acute coronary syndrome consider coronary revascularization Reference vessel diameter 2.5 3.5 mm operator assessment Contraindication antiplatelet agent Ostial lesion within 5 mm ostium Different DES vessel simultaneously Creatinine level 2.5 mg/dL Left main stenosis 50 % . vein graft lesion Triple vessel disease stenosis 50 % 3 epicardial coronary artery Life expectancy 1 year Reference vessel < 2.5 mm > 4.0 mm diameter visual Long lesion require three stent
